label: Salnitska, Maria & Alexey Y. Solodovnikov.  2018. Hypogean presumably sister species Quedius repentinus sp. n. from  Altai and Q. roma from Sikhote-Alin (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae):  a disjunct distribution or poorly sampled Siberia?. Zootaxa 4394(1): 95–104.
